1.text: A popular psychological game. The plot is simple. The peaceful residents of the city, tired of the rampant mafia, decide to take justice into their own hands and kill the criminals. The mafia, in response, declares war with the aim of destroying all the townspeople. The mafia and the peaceful residents play against each other. The peaceful residents win if they identify and 'send to death' all the mafiosi. The mafia wins if the victory of the peaceful residents is mathematically impossible.
1.title: Mafia
Peaceful Resident
1.description: The most numerous role in the game. Their task is to identify and eliminate all the mafia team players during the day vote. They do not act at night. They win when all the mafia are eliminated.

2.title: Sheriff
2.description: Plays for the team of peaceful residents. The sheriff's task is to help the team of peaceful residents by secretly checking players for mafia affiliation at night. Each night, they have the right to secretly check one (any) player.

3.title: Mafia
3.description: Plays for the mafia team. The mafia's task is to kill all the peaceful residents at night and, if possible, nominate peaceful team players for voting. Each night, they have the right to secretly choose a victim together with the Don and other mafia team members.

4.title: Don
4.description: Plays for the mafia team. The Don's task is to lead their team to victory. Each night, they have the right to secretly identify the sheriff through night checks to subsequently eliminate them. The Don is the main player of the mafia team, determining the course of the game by negotiating with their allies.

5.title: Doctor
5.description: Plays for the team of peaceful residents. The doctor's task is to protect the sheriff from mafia attacks. Each night, they have the right to secretly go on night duty and save someone's life. Available only in the extended game mode.

1.title: Classic
1.description: Classic tournament mafia with roles: Peaceful Resident, Don, Sheriff, Mafia

2.title: Extended
2.description: Extended mafia mode with roles: Peaceful Resident, Don, Sheriff, Mafia, Doctor
